column4: can someone help me troubleshoot why the wi-fi connection (that worked before) doesn't work on the ubuntu machine after I had to reset the router?
is it an atheros wireless card? if so, it might not be compatible with 9.04 (9.10 allows more), check compatibility
its the same ubuntu version and the same router as when it worked. The only difference is that the router was reset, and the network given a new name and password
hmm...wpa or wep? if wpa, try a different scheme, such as AES or the other one listed in drop down
